summary: Frontend adds a new React Query hook (useStakingInfo) and a StakingSection UI component with loading and empty states. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the backend getStakingInfo query was implemented/exposed, nor that the Profile page actually renders the new Staking section, nor that candid bindings were regenerated to include the new method.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a public query method named getStakingInfo returning a nullable StakingRecord for the caller, backed by existing stakingRecords, and available via generated frontend candid bindings.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo is truncated and does not show any getStakingInfo method or its implementation details (nullable return, caller lookup in stakingRecords). There is also no evidence in the diff summary of regenerated candid/bindings being updated to include getStakingInfo.
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useStakingInfo.ts (calls actor.getStakingInfo but does not prove backend/bindings exist)

missing_requirements.requirement: Profile page renders a read-only Staking section card that fetches staking info via getStakingInfo and shows Total Staked, Available Balance, Locked Balance, Pending Rewards with loading and empty states.
missing_requirements.reason: A StakingSection component and hook were added, but the diff summary does not show changes to the Profile page itself to include/render this section.
